bug.author: nsubiron
bug.summary: Server is not always ready when an "EpisodeReady" is sent
bug.description: There is a race condition between the server and the client due to this, during a start episode sometimes the client fails to connect the agent subclients because the server is not yet ready.

comments.comment: Not critical anymore. This currently goes unnoticed as the current client API automatically does another try if a connection fails.
No longer relevant with the new API.
